___comment1: property names are inspired by boto3
Anywhere a template is referenced you can specify a VTL filename,
___comment3: The deploy script will read the file and use its contents.

methodIntegration.___comment1: You can also use type=Lambda here and specify a
methodIntegration.___comment2: CF Logical ID as the uri, prefixed by Fn. The deploy script will replace the
methodIntegration.___comment3: Logical ID with the correct ARN and build the URI as required
methodIntegration.___comment5: For MOCK integrations you must set requestTemplates={"statusCode": 200}
